patterns: What projects has Vanshaj worked on
What projects has Vanshaj worked on
responses: Vanshaj has worked on a variety of projects in the fields of Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Computer Vision, Web Development, and Software Development. Some of his notable projects include  a Face Recognition System, a Chatbot, a Personal Portfolio Website, an Android app that solves a system of linear equations, and a Hospital Management Application. He also led the development of a website for a 3 day event hosted ny Backslash Computing Society, TIET, which featured an online cryptic hunt, and displayed robustness against attacks and a large amount of requests. You can find more details about his projects on his personal website.

Besides the field of technology, Vanshaj loves stories, in the form of books, movies, web series, or anime, he enjoys good stories, especially those of mystery, magic and adventure. He is also a fan of music, and enjoys listening to a variety of genres. He also enjoys sports, having played a lot during his childhood. He also enjoys playing video games, and is very enthusiastic about FPS games while enjoying RPGs with good storylines. He also enjoys learning new things, and is always looking to expand his knowledge and skills. He also has his geeky side with being a fan of Marvel and DC comics, Harry Potter, and is a big time Game of Thrones fan, among more fandoms.
